instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.A1398: What is A1398? A1398 is a model number for a 15 inch size MacBook Pro Retina from years Mid 2015, Mid 2012, Early 2013, Late 2013, Mid 2014 with EMC 2909, that may contain one of these boards depending on the year & configuration: 820-00138, 820-00163, 820-00426, 820-3332, 820-3662, 820-3787..
definitions.820-00138: What is 820-00138? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: Macbook Pro <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1398</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> mid-2015 <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00138</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A FREEZING AFTER MINUTES
threads.message: Hi , after normal boot up about 5 minutes it freezes, the trackpad  and keyboard not responding and usb mouse also not responding also but youtube video continue playing few minutes after freezing  then restarts automatically.  I replaced ssd but not fixed ,then i swap all 3   FDMF6808  from other working board but not fixed , temperature is normal and thermal past replaced, fans spin normally , any suggestions ?

threads.title: Macbook Pro <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1398</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> mid-2015 <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00138</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A FREEZING AFTER MINUTES
threads.message:
NEVER reuse FDMF6808 from other MLB.
Change with real new FDM6708/3030, bought from reliable store (not China).

You should try known good BIOS clean ME first.

threads.title: Macbook Pro <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1398</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> mid-2015 <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00138</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A FREEZING AFTER MINUTES
threads.message:
thanks for your advice , but other board i swapped  FDMF6808  to working fine 
I try other bios "<MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1398</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> 820-<SIGNAL>00138_UNLOCK</SIGNAL> Clear me"but not fixed
i reinstall macos but it freezes randomly  during finishing install 
what is other possible reasons?

threads.title: Macbook Pro <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1398</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> mid-2015 <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00138</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A FREEZING AFTER MINUTES
threads.message:
Test another clean ME BIOS, just in case.

Can you load a macOS from a SSD preinstalled in other machine?
Also test with USB macOS.

Starting in diagnostic mode shows any error?

threads.title: Macbook Pro <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1398</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> mid-2015 <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00138</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A FREEZING AFTER MINUTES
threads.message:
i already test more than 3 macOS from a SSD preinstalled in other machine but always freezes, 
the same situation on other bios ,
diagnostic mode shows this error

threads.title: Macbook Pro <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1398</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> mid-2015 <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00138</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A FREEZING AFTER MINUTES
threads.message:
Be sure to use original 85W magsafe 2 charger.

Check <SIGNAL>SMC_DCIN_VSENSE</SIGNAL>/ISENSE and <SIGNAL>SMC_PBUS_VSENSE</SIGNAL> levels.
Also test the machine disconnecting RIO board.

threads.title: Macbook Pro <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1398</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> mid-2015 <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00138</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A FREEZING AFTER MINUTES
threads.message:
i disconnect two j9500 and j9510  RIO board but not fixed,
i use  85W magsafe 2 charger but the problem also still  [COLOR=rgb(209, 72, 65)]when i using battery [/COLOR]
